mapper.select: /* adjournmentMapper."adjournmentList" */ SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 as row_num, adjinfo.adjournment_seq, adjinfo.member_seq, adjinfo.store_seq, adjinfo.order_seq, adjinfo.adjournment_start, adjinfo.adjournment_end, adjinfo.adjournment_state, adjinfo.adjournment_memo, adjinfo.del_yn, adjinfo.register_date, adjinfo.register_id, adjinfo.modify_date, adjinfo.modify_id, ( SELECT name FROM MEMBERINFO WHERE member_seq = adjinfo.member_seq ) AS name, ( SELECT phone FROM MEMBERINFO WHERE member_seq = adjinfo.member_seq ) AS phone, ( SELECT store_name FROM STOREINFO WHERE store_seq = adjinfo.store_seq ) AS store_name, ( SELECT product_name FROM productinfo where product_seq = ordinfo.product_seq ) as product_name FROM ADJOURNMENTINFO adjinfo INNER JOIN ORDERINFO ordinfo ON adjinfo.order_seq = ordinfo.order_seq INNER JOIN (SELECT @ROWNUM :=0) AS R WHERE adjinfo.store_seq =#{storeSeq} AND adjinfo.del_yn = 'N' ORDER BY adjinfo.modify_date DESC
mapper.insert: /* adjournmentMapper."insertAdjournment" */ INSERT INTO ADJOURNMENTINFO ( member_seq, store_seq, order_seq, adjournment_start, adjournment_end, adjournment_memo, register_id, modify_id ) VALUES ( #{memberSeq}, #{storeSeq}, #{orderSeq}, #{adjournmentStart}, #{adjournmentEnd}, #{adjournmentMemo}, #{registerId}, #{modifyId} )
mapper.select: /* adjournmentMapper.adjournmentDetail */ SELECT adjinfo.adjournment_seq, adjinfo.member_seq, adjinfo.store_seq, adjinfo.order_seq, adjinfo.adjournment_start, adjinfo.adjournment_end, adjinfo.adjournment_state, adjinfo.adjournment_memo, mbrinfo.name, mbrinfo.phone, mbrinfo.email, mbrinfo.birth, mbrinfo.sex, prdinfo.product_name, ( SELECT item_name FROM PRODUCTITEM WHERE item_seq = prdinfo.item_seq ) AS item_name, ordinfo.remaining_count, ordinfo.product_count, ( SELECT store_name FROM STOREINFO where store_seq = adjinfo.store_seq ) AS store_name FROM ADJOURNMENTINFO adjinfo INNER JOIN MEMBERINFO mbrinfo ON adjinfo.member_seq = mbrinfo.member_seq INNER JOIN ORDERINFO ordinfo ON adjinfo.order_seq = ordinfo.order_seq INNER JOIN PRODUCTINFO prdinfo ON ordinfo.product_seq = prdinfo.product_seq WHERE adjinfo.adjournment_seq = #{adjournmentSeq}
